Description: Wall fragment of pottery transport amphora. Very coarse, reddish-yellow (5 YR 7/6) clay with many fragments of silver mica. Exterior had dull brown paint; interior reserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
The size of the fragment does not allow any close diagnosis.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.32 no. A 32 pl. 8.4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JA.035)
